title: Ep. #93 | Best K-pop Songs of 2020 with Eddie Nam
description:
Eric and Eddie are back to reflect on the best K-pop songs and moments of 2020! While the global pandemic put live concerts and tours on pause, K-pop still flourished and brought joy to fans all over the world. Who are the K-pop artists that stood out in 2020 and what impact did K-pop have on the music and entertainment industries at large? Get ready, 'cause there's a lot to unpack!

Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave a comment, rating and/or review on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, Soundcloud, and YouTube.

Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios

Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !

SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios

#Kpop #DaebakShow #DIVEStudios #EricNam​ #에릭남
